channel.title: My portfolio and personal blog
channel.description: This is my portfolio and personal blog

item.title: Cosmos Devlog 2: The basis of movement
item.description: Achieved piece movement, en passant, and efficient code refactorization. Check system coming soon. Focus on refining the engine and UI. Current shift to Deadlock project before returning. Stay tuned for updates!
item.author: david

item.title: Cosmos Devlog: Introduction
item.description: This new project aims to be both a learning tool for aspiring chess players and a journey of knowledge expansion for myself.
item.author: david

item.title: Migrating my Portfolio to Astro
item.description: In this post I detail my shift from Next.js to Astro for my portfolio and blog. I explore Astro's benefits, migration challenges, and improved user experience. Astro's native file compatibility and the new content collection system are highlighted, enabling seamless integration without third-party dependencies.
item.author: david

item.title: Making a Multiplayer FPS: Basic Movement
item.description: In this post, I've successfully implemented basic player movement. Players can move, jump, and look around. Jittering is the next problem to be solved.
item.author: david

item.title: Making a Multiplayer FPS: Introduction
item.description: In this blog series, I'll be taking you through the process of creating my own online first-person shooter (FPS) game.
item.author: david
